Title: 065: How Data Science Brings Value through Consulting Firms
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with CEO & Co-founder at SFL Scientific Michael Segala. You will hear about several exciting case studies from the consulting world, see how Data Science can be used in different areas of an organization, learn how it drives real value into business, and finally get valuable insights on data strategy and fantastic tips for those who are building a career in Data Science.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/65
